content.text: Match ends, Espanyol 1, Almería 2.
Second Half ends, Espanyol 1, Almería 2.

Héctor Moreno (Espanyol) is shown the yellow card.
Javi López (Espanyol) is shown the red card.
Jonathan (Almería) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Javi López (Espanyol).
Corner,  Espanyol. Conceded by Esteban.
Offside, Almería. Corona tries a through ball, but Jonathan is caught offside.
Attempt missed. Pizzi (Espanyol) left footed shot from the left side of the box is close, but misses to the left following a set piece situation.
